column6:
Bruce Banner faces law and order Atlantis-style when his latest attempt to cure himself creates a plague of Hulked-out marine life. Namor, the Sub-Mariner, is out to make Bruce pay for endangering his fabled undersea kingdom, but dragging the Hulk in front of a judge is a sure-fire guarantee of disorder in the court.,2007,12

All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Paul Benjamin | penciller:Mario Gully | colorist:Michelle Madsen | letterer:Dave Sharpe
